entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
